```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n, mu = 2, sigma = 3) {
  
  sim_data = tibble(
    x = rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma),
  )
  
  sim_data |> 
    summarize(
      mu_hat = mean(x),
      sigma_hat = sd(x)
    )
}
```

can I verify the central limit theorem

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
output=vector("list", length = 100)
for (i in 1:100){
  
  output[[i]]=sim_mean_sd(30)

}

output %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=mu_hat))+
  geom_density()
```
